prompt_base: brilliant young scientist, voluminous auburn hair, thick black-framed glasses, white laboratory coat, blue and red checkered dress
feature_prompt: subsurface scattering, detailed cotton fabric, crisp glasses frame, individual flowing hair strands, realistic skin pores
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic, doll, smooth hair, exaggerated eyes, flat lighting, low quality, blurry face, deformed glasses
